entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow early this morning. Clearing this morning. Fog patches early this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
